titles.title: ACCESS Act of 2024
ACCESS Act of 2024
Assisting Community Colleges in Educating Skilled Students to Careers Act of 2024
A bill to amend the Higher Education Act of 1965 to establish a community college and career training grant program.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

committee.name: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions
